METADATA.TITLE: Next.js Starter
METADATA.DESCRIPTION: A modern Next.js starter template with internationalization support

ERROR.TITLE: Something went wrong
ERROR.DESCRIPTION: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again or contact support if the problem persists.

GLOBAL_ERROR.TITLE: Application Error
GLOBAL_ERROR.DESCRIPTION: A critical error occurred in the application. Please refresh the page or contact support.

NOT_FOUND.HEADING: Page Not Found
NOT_FOUND.DESCRIPTION: The page you are looking for does not exist or has been moved.

HOME.TITLE: Welcome to Next.js Starter
HOME.DESCRIPTION: A production-ready starter template with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and comprehensive tooling.
HOME.FEATURE_1: Next.js 16 with App Router and React Server Components
HOME.FEATURE_2: TypeScript with strict mode and additional safety checks
HOME.FEATURE_3: Tailwind CSS v4 with dark mode support

ABOUT.TITLE: About
ABOUT.SUBTITLE: Learn more about this starter template

PRIVACY.TITLE: Privacy Policy
PRIVACY.INTRO: This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our services.
PRIVACY.SECTION_1_CONTENT: We may collect information you provide directly to us, such as your name, email address, or other contact details. We may also collect basic technical data automatically, including IP address, browser type, device information, and usage activity.
PRIVACY.SECTION_2_CONTENT: We use your information to operate and improve our services, communicate with you, respond to inquiries, and maintain security. We do not sell your personal information.
PRIVACY.SECTION_3_CONTENT: We may share information with trusted service providers who help us operate our services. We may also disclose information if required by law or to protect our rights and users.
PRIVACY.SECTION_4_CONTENT: We take reasonable measures to protect your information, but no system is completely secure. Use of the service is at your own risk.
PRIVACY.SECTION_5_CONTENT: You may request access to, correction of, or deletion of your personal information where applicable by law.
PRIVACY.SECTION_6_CONTENT: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Continued use of the service means you accept the updated policy.
PRIVACY.SECTION_7_CONTENT: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, contact us through our official support channels.

TERMS.TITLE: Terms of Service
TERMS.INTRO: These Terms of Service govern your use of our services. By accessing or using the service, you agree to these terms.
TERMS.SECTION_1_CONTENT: You agree to use the service only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these terms. You may not misuse, disrupt, or attempt to gain unauthorized access to the service.
TERMS.SECTION_2_CONTENT: If you create an account, you are responsible for maintaining its security and for all activity under your account.
TERMS.SECTION_3_CONTENT: All content, software, and materials provided through the service are owned by us or our licensors. You may not copy, modify, or distribute them without permission.
TERMS.SECTION_4_CONTENT: The service is provided on an as is and as available basis. We make no warranties of any kind, express or implied.
TERMS.SECTION_5_CONTENT: To the maximum extent permitted by law, we are not liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from your use of the service.
TERMS.SECTION_6_CONTENT: We may suspend or terminate access to the service at any time if you violate these terms.
TERMS.SECTION_7_CONTENT: We may update these Terms of Service from time to time. Continued use of the service means you accept the updated terms.
TERMS.SECTION_8_CONTENT: These terms are governed by the laws of the applicable jurisdiction, without regard to conflict of law principles.
